references.name: Jason Brodsky-Porges (Product Manager at Offerpop)
references.reference: I had the pleasure to work with Dan Kaplun at Offerpop, where I was the Product Manager for our team. He was a very respected coworker who brought many desirable attributes. He was a very friendly coworker as well as a great communicator who was willing to walk other members of his team through the technology stack in order to get everyone up to speed efficiently on many occasions. He grasped concepts and ideas quickly and was able to efficiently implement them into our technology. I believe you will find Dan to be an excellent web developer and a strong contributor to your organization.
